

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = 0;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir
            from template_select
            where template_language = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code
                      from currencies
                      where code = 'USD' LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_firstname, customers_lastname
                         from customers
                         where customers_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                              from whos_online
                              where session_id = 'hibekk9184mm1086pq0hrfu214' and ip_address='127.0.0.1';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select categories_name
                           from categories_description
                           where categories_id = '4'
                           and language_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select *
        from get_terms_to_filter;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_name
                   from products_description
                   where products_id = '4'
             and language_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select type_handler from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter, session_counter from counter_history where startdate='20121207';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM counter_history WHERE startdate = '20121207' AND counter = 1 AND session_counter = 1 LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select startdate, counter from counter;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
          from products p, products_description pd
          where    p.products_status = '1'
          and      p.products_id = '4'
          and      pd.products_id = p.products_id
          and      pd.language_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select cd.categories_name from categories c, categories_description cd where c.parent_id = 0 and c.categories_id = cd.categories_id and cd.language_id='2' and c.categories_status=1;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select pd.products_name, p.products_model, p.products_price_sorter, p.products_tax_class_id,
                                      p.metatags_title_status, p.metatags_products_name_status, p.metatags_model_status,
                                      p.products_id, p.metatags_price_status, p.metatags_title_tagline_status,
                                      pd.products_description, p.product_is_free, p.product_is_call,
                                      mtpd.metatags_title, mtpd.metatags_keywords, mtpd.metatags_description
                              from (products p, products_description pd) left join meta_tags_products_description mtpd on mtpd.products_id = p.products_id and mtpd.language_id = '2'
                              where p.products_id = '4'
                              and p.products_id = pd.products_id
                              and pd.language_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_tax_class_id, products_price, products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_free, product_is_call from products where products_id = '4' limit 1;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '4' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '4' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;

select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '4' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select master_categories_id from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,4,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from ezpages where status_header = 1 and header_sort_order > 0 order by header_sort_order, pages_title;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                          from languages 
                          order by sort_order;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                          from languages 
                          order by sort_order;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select layout_box_name from layout_boxes where layout_box_location = 0 and layout_box_status= '1' and layout_template ='denim' order by layout_box_sort_order;

select products_tax_class_id, products_price, products_priced_by_attribute, product_is_free, product_is_call, products_type from products where products_id = '1' limit 1;

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,1,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '122.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '122.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: whatsnew

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,3,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '12.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: whatsnew

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,4,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: whatsnew

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: whatsnew

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: bestsellers

Explain 
select count(*) as count
                      from customers_info
                      where customers_info_id = '1'
                      and global_product_notifications = '1';

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: featured

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '1'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: featured

Explain 
select parent_id
                                from categories
                                where categories_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: bannerboxall

Explain 
select banners_id from banners where status = 1  and ( banners_group = 'BannersAll') order by banners_sort_order;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
          from products p, products_description pd
          where    p.products_status = '1'
          and      p.products_id = '4'
          and      pd.products_id = p.products_id
          and      pd.language_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, pd.products_name,
                  pd.products_description, p.products_model,
                  p.products_quantity, p.products_image,
                  pd.products_url, p.products_price,
                  p.products_tax_class_id, p.products_date_added,
                  p.products_date_available, p.manufacturers_id, p.products_quantity,
                  p.products_weight, p.products_priced_by_attribute, p.product_is_free,
                  p.products_qty_box_status,
                  p.products_quantity_order_max,
                  p.products_discount_type, p.products_discount_type_from, p.products_sort_order, p.products_price_sorter
           from   products p, products_description pd
           where  p.products_status = '1'
           and    p.products_id = '4'
           and    pd.products_id = p.products_id
           and    pd.language_id = '2';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select m.manufacturers_name
                      from products p, manufacturers m
                      where p.products_id = '4'
                      and p.manufacturers_id = m.manufacturers_id;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_model, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_price, products_priced_by_attribute from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select options_id, price_prefix, options_values_price, attributes_display_only, attributes_price_base_included, round(concat(price_prefix, options_values_price), 5) as value from products_attributes where products_id = '4' and attributes_display_only != '1' and attributes_price_base_included='1' order by options_id, value;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_new_products_price from specials where products_id = '4' and status='1';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select master_categories_id from products where products_id = '4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,4,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
          from products_options popt, products_attributes patrib
          where    patrib.products_id='4'
            and      patrib.options_id = popt.products_options_id
            and      popt.language_id = '2' limit 1;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as count from reviews r, reviews_description rd
                       where r.products_id = '4'
                       and r.reviews_id = rd.reviews_id
                       and rd.languages_id = '2' and r.status = '1';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, p.products_model, p.products_price_sorter, pd.products_name, p.products_sort_order
          from   products p, products_description pd, products_to_categories ptc
          where  p.products_status = '1' and p.products_id = pd.products_id and pd.language_id= '2' and p.products_id = ptc.products_id and ptc.categories_id = '4' order by pd.products_name;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select categories_name
            from   categories_description
            where  categories_id = 4 AND language_id = '2';

                      where products_id = '4'

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

select sale_specials_condition, sale_deduction_value, sale_deduction_type from salemaker_sales where sale_categories_all like '%,4,%' and sale_status = '1' and (sale_date_start <= now() or sale_date_start = '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end >= now() or sale_date_end = '0001-01-01') and (sale_pricerange_from <= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_from = '0') and (sale_pricerange_to >= '399.0000' or sale_pricerange_to = '0');



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sum(tax_rate) as tax_rate
                  from (tax_rates tr
                  left join zones_to_geo_zones za on (tr.tax_zone_id = za.geo_zone_id)
                  left join geo_zones tz on (tz.geo_zone_id = tr.tax_zone_id) )
                  where (za.zone_country_id is null
                  or za.zone_country_id = 0
                  or za.zone_country_id = '44')
                  and (za.zone_id is null
                  or za.zone_id = 0
                  or za.zone_id = '0')
                  and tr.tax_class_id = '0'
                  group by tr.tax_priority;

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select products_type from products where products_id='4';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select allow_add_to_cart from product_types where type_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select p.products_id, p.products_image
                     from orders_products opa, orders_products opb, orders o, products p
                     where opa.products_id = '4'
                     and opa.orders_id = opb.orders_id
                     and opb.products_id != '4'
                     and opb.products_id = p.products_id
                     and opb.orders_id = o.orders_id
                     and p.products_status = 1
                     group by p.products_id
                     order by o.date_purchased desc
                     limit 6;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select layout_box_name from layout_boxes where layout_box_location=1 and layout_box_status=1 and layout_template ='denim' order by layout_box_sort_order;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: orderhistory

Explain 
select distinct op.products_id
                   from orders o, orders_products op, products p
                   where o.customers_id = '1'
                   and o.orders_id = op.orders_id
                   and op.products_id = p.products_id
                   and p.products_status = '1'
                   group by products_id
                   order by o.date_purchased desc
                   limit 6;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: orderhistory

Explain 
select products_id, products_name
                         from products_description
                         where products_id in (4,3,2,1)
                         and language_id = '2'
                         order by products_name;

I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: shoppingcart

Explain 
select amount from coupon_gv_customer where customer_id = '1';



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from ezpages where status_footer = 1 and footer_sort_order > 0 order by footer_sort_order, pages_title;



I AM HERE product_info
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = 'hibekk9184mm1086pq0hrfu214';
